issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: webconsole
components.description: Web console such as the old and the new hawtio console

fields.description:
When sending a message to a destination in the webconsole, a JMSException is thrown:

{code}
javax.jms.JMSException: Cannot add a producer to a session that had not been registered: ID:latitude-58030-1435119975729-1:1:1

	at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:790)
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHolder.handle(ServletHolder.java:808)
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler$CachedChain.doFilter(ServletHandler.java:1669)
	at org.apache.activemq.web.AuditFilter.doFilter(AuditFilter.java:59)
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler$CachedChain.doFilter(ServletHandler.java:1652)
	at org.springframework.web.filter.RequestContextFilter.doFilterInternal(RequestContextFilter.java:99)

	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler$CachedChain.doFilter(ServletHandler.java:1652)
	at org.apache.activemq.web.filter.ApplicationContextFilter.doFilter(ApplicationContextFilter.java:102)
	at org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHandler$CachedChain.doFilter(ServletHandler.java:1652)

	at org.ops4j.pax.web.service.jetty.internal.HttpServiceContext.doHandle(HttpServiceContext.java:267)

fields.summary: JMSException when sending a message in the WebConsole

comments.body: Could not reproduce, not enough information provided.

Hi Tim, it was easy to reproduce with 5.11.1: just try to send a message from the admin web console.

I didn't test with latest version, I will, and reopen the Jira accordingly.
Sent several using latest release without issue.
